title: Updates are officially live
body: This is the first members update...

title: Animation test: walk cycle pass
body: Testing timing and head movement. Next pass is smoothing the arcs and tightening the foot strikes.

title: Concept art drop
body: A few new rough sketches for an upcoming sequence. These are early—just exploring shapes, mood, and poses.
